description:
Zipped UCMR3 data. 

This dataset is associated with the following publication:
HU, X., D. Andrews, T. Bruton, A. Lindstrom, L.  Schaider, P. Grandjean, R. Lohmann, C. Carignan, A. Blum, S. Balan, E. Sunderland, and C. Higgins. Detection of Poly- and Perfluoroalkyl Substances (PFASs) in U.S. Dinking Water: Linked to Industrial Sites, Military fire Training Areas and Wastewater Treatment Plants.   Environmental Science & Technology Letters. American Chemical Society, Washington, DC, USA, 3(0): 344-350, (2017).

publisher.name: U.S. EPA Office of Research and Development (ORD)

title: UCMR3 data
